scripts.get-hdb: ./scripts/curl-ssz.sh HDB.zip && unzip -o input/HDB.zip HDB.csv HDB_MAPPING.csv && mv HDB.csv input/hdb.csv && mv HDB_MAPPING.csv input/hdb_mapping.csv
scripts.get-hdb-integ: env CI_COMMIT_TAG=bla ./scripts/curl-ssz.sh HDB.zip && unzip -o input/HDB.zip HDB.csv HDB_MAPPING.csv && mv HDB.csv input/hdb.csv && mv HDB_MAPPING.csv input/hdb_mapping.csv
scripts.clean-hdb: cat target/hdb.nt target/hdb_mapping.nt | sed '/_:/d' | sed '/<file/d' > target/hdb-clean.nt
scripts.tdb-load: tdbloader --loc target/tdb_ssz target/void.ttl input/static.ttl target/hdb-clean.nt target/dimensions.nt
scripts.stardog-load: stardog data remove --all ssz-staging && stardog data add ssz-staging target/void.ttl input/static.ttl target/hdb-clean.nt target/dimensions.nt
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean get-hdb get-dimensions convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump
scripts.build-integ: npm-run-all clean get-hdb-integ get-dimensions-integ convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump
scripts.build-cache: npm-run-all clean convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp tdb-load tdb-query tdb-dump
scripts.build-stardog: npm-run-all clean convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb void-timestamp stardog-load stardog-query stardog-dump
